system.description:
Gnomes have an uncanny ability to disappear from sight:

▶ In woodland cover, a gnome can hide with a 90%  [[/r 1d100]]chance of success.

▶ In dungeons, a gnome can hide in shadows or behind other forms of cover. The chance of success is 2-in-6 [[/r 1d6]]. Hiding requires the gnome to be motionless.
